history.proof: intros net H_refined. unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond. unfold votes_votesWithLog. unfold votesWithLog_votes. shelve.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface to an evaluable reference.

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface net : network H_refined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net The term "rri" has type "raft_refinement_interface" while it is expected to have type "network".

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface net : network H_refined : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net Unable to unify "refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net" with "(forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name) (log : list entry), In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, h') (votes (fst (nwState net h)))) /\\ (forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name), In (t, h') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> exists log : list entry, In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_votesWithLog_correspond net

Premises:

Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) =...
refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
refined_raft_net_invariant' : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVote (pDst p) (pSrc p) t (pSrc p) lli llt (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net'
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
votes_votesWithLog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name) (log : list entry), In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, h') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_votesWithLog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votesWithLog_votes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (h' : name), In (t, h') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> exists log : list entry, In (t, h', log) (votesWithLog (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votesWithLog_votes {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> update_elections_data_input h inp (nwState net h) = gd -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) (gd, d) h) ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
intros net H_refined.
unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond.
unfold votes_votesWithLog.
unfold votesWithLog_votes.
intros h t h' log H_in.
unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface in rri.
apply rri.(votes_votesWithLog_correspond_invariant) with (net:=net).
apply H_refined.
apply H_in.
```

original: intros net H_refined. unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond. unfold votes_votesWithLog. unfold votesWithLog_votes. intros h t h' log H_in. unfold votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface in rri. apply rri.(votes_votesWithLog_correspond_invariant) with (net:=net). apply H_refined. apply H_in.
